original_title: Warts & All: The Films of Danny Plotnick
overview: Underground filmmaker Danny Plotnick's creations earned a rabid cult following in the 1980s with their blend of highbrow and low culture elements, combined with Plotnick's healthy dose of snarling punk sensibility. This compilation features a sampling of his Super 8 format masterpieces, including "Skate Witches" (1986), "Flip About Flip" (1990), "Steel Belted Romeos" (1990), "I, Socky" (1998) and "Swingers' Serenade" (1999).
title: Warts & All: The Films of Danny Plotnick
